content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: --TOXGR
      operator: not_exists
    - name: --TOX           # checking failure criteria; when --TOXGR is not present, but --TOX is, there's a problem because --TOX is only supposed to be there to qualify --TOXGR
      operator: exists
Core:
  Id: CORE-000023
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Raise an error when --TOXGR is not present in dataset, but --TOX is present
Outcome:
  Message: --TOX present in dataset even though --TOXGR is not
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Dataset
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0084
              Version: '2'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Variable Qualifier of --TOXGR
                Document: Model v2.0
                Section: Events
                Item: --TOX
              - Cited Guidance: Variable Qualifier of --TOXGR
                Document: Model v2.0
                Section: Findings
                Item: --TOX
              - Cited Guidance: Variable Qualifier of --TOXGR
                Document: Model v1.7
                Section: 2.2.2
              - Cited Guidance: Variable Qualifier of --TOXGR
                Document: Model v1.4
                Section: 2.2.2
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.3'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0084
              Version: '2'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Variable Qualifier of --TOXGR
                Document: Model v2.0
                Section: Events
                Item: --TOX
              - Cited Guidance: Variable Qualifier of --TOXGR
                Document: Model v2.0
                Section: Findings
                Item: --TOX
              - Cited Guidance: Variable Qualifier of --TOXGR
                Document: Model v1.7
                Section: 2.2.2
              - Cited Guidance: Variable Qualifier of --TOXGR
                Document: Model v1.4
                Section: 2.2.2
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.2'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0084
              Version: '2'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Variable Qualifier of --TOXGR
                Document: Model v2.0
                Section: Events
                Item: --TOX
              - Cited Guidance: Variable Qualifier of --TOXGR
                Document: Model v2.0
                Section: Findings
                Item: --TOX
              - Cited Guidance: Variable Qualifier of --TOXGR
                Document: Model v1.7
                Section: 2.2.2
              - Cited Guidance: Variable Qualifier of --TOXGR
                Document: Model v1.4
                Section: 2.2.2
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - EVENTS
      - FINDINGS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL
